mema sathiya muladi nikuth karana lada warthawaka eya janawariyekala peradakimata sapekshawa, idiri dashakaya thula wardhanaya dolar triliyana 7.9 kin adu kara athi athara eya dala deshiya nishpadithayen siyayata 3 kata samana we. 2029 awasana karthuwa wana thek dala deshiya nishpadithaye wardhanaya, ehi pera purokathana mattama kara nopaminenu athi bawa sibioo anawaki pala karayi.

aayurweda wedakamin prayojana dekak labagatha haki bawath eewa nam walanduna rogayata piliyam kirimath, rogi thaththwayanta pathnowi nirogi bawa raka ganimath ee sandaha kalayuthu awathum pawathum anugamanaya kirimath bawa pawasamin hela osu guna waruna pilibandawa wimasumaka nirathawa aayurwedayehi la ganena hela osu wishala pramanayak pilibandawa apa samaga mewara sanwadayaka niratha wuye anuradhapuraye prakata aayurweda waidyawarayaku wu es.es. gunawardhana mahathmaya.

mandayath, parisara amathyadhurayada hobawana athigaru janadhipathithumage magapenwima ha garu agramathyathumage aashirwadaya sahithawa mawisin genayana parisara dushana wirodhi kriyakarakam thula prathipakshikayinge pamanak nowa rajayata sambandha parshawayangeda dushitha wyaparayan nawathalimata ma kriya kota athi nisaya.
